learningContent.title: Referencing map files in map files

lcInstruction.p: In addition to linking to topics, you can reference map files inside map files. In this approach, the subordinate maps (submaps) are usually a collection of related content. For example, you can create a chapter-level map file for each chapter in a book, and then reference those chapter-level map files inside your main book-level map file.
